landing.heroSubtitle: Your AI that actually does things
landing.heroDescription: Not just another chatbot. Nova connects to your life â€” calendar, email, smart home, and more. Tell it what you need, it makes it happen.
landing.featuresHeading: Everything you need, one conversation away
landing.ctaHeading: Ready to meet your new AI companion?
landing.ctaDescription: Try Nova today and see what AI can actually do for you. It's free to start.

email.title: Email & Calendar
email.description: Check emails, schedule meetings, get reminders. Nova keeps your day organized.

smartHome.title: Smart Home
smartHome.description: "Turn off the lights" â€” works with Hue, Sonos, and your favorite devices.

entertainment.title: Entertainment
entertainment.description: Play music, find shows, set the mood. Your entertainment, simplified.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: Your data stays yours. We don't sell it, share it, or use it for training.

everywhere.title: Works Everywhere
everywhere.description: Web, mobile, voice. Access Nova from any device, anytime.

noSetup.title: No Setup Required
noSetup.description: Sign up, connect accounts, done. No terminal, no configs, no headaches.

auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to continue to Nova
auth.name: Name
auth.termsAgreement: By creating an account, you agree to our
auth.somethingWentWrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth.socialSignInError: Could not sign in with {provider}. Please try again.

onboarding.step2Subtitle: What would you like me to help with?
onboarding.addMoreLater: You can always add more later
onboarding.step3Subtitle: I'm ready to help you with anything. Let's get started!

settings.freePlan: Free plan Â· Member since Feb 2026
settings.voiceDescription: Nova will speak responses out loud
settings.notificationsDescription: Get alerts for reminders and updates
settings.deleteAccountDescription: This will permanently delete your account, conversations, and all connected integrations.

chat.greetingDescription: Your personal AI assistant. I can help you with tasks, answer questions, and make your life easier. What would you like to do today?
chat.errorMessage: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: Hmm, I couldn't find what you're looking for. Let's get you back on track.

meta.title: Nova AI - Your Personal AI Companion
meta.description: Meet Nova, your friendly AI assistant that actually gets things done. Smart home, calendar, emails, and more - all in one place.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect Your Apps
integrations.description: Link your favorite services to unlock the full power of Nova. The more you connect, the more I can help.
integrations.noIntegrationsDescription: Connect your apps to let Nova help you more

connectionModal.pleaseWait: Please wait while we set things up
connectionModal.demoNote: This is a demo. In production, this would open an OAuth authorization window.

google.name: Google
google.fullDescription: Connect your Google account to access Calendar for scheduling, Gmail for reading emails, and Drive for file search.

hue.name: Philips Hue
hue.fullDescription: Philips Hue smart light integration is coming soon. Connect to control lights, set scenes, and adjust brightness.

spotify.name: Spotify
spotify.fullDescription: Connect Spotify to check what's playing and search for songs, artists, and albums through Nova.

sonos.name: Sonos
sonos.fullDescription: Sonos speaker integration is coming soon. Control multi-room audio, adjust volume, and group speakers.

notion.name: Notion
notion.fullDescription: Access your Notion workspace. Search pages, create notes, and manage your databases with natural language.

slack.name: Slack
slack.fullDescription: Connect Slack to search messages and browse your team channels through Nova.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.pageDescription: Master Nova with these keyboard shortcuts. Work faster, type less.
shortcuts.tipText: Press âŒ˜K anywhere to quickly search and navigate

cmdK.detail: The fastest way to do anything in Nova. Search conversations, run commands, navigate anywhere.

question.detail: Opens this shortcuts modal from anywhere in the app.

escape.detail: Closes any open modal, dialog, or cancels the current action.

cmdN.detail: Start a fresh conversation with Nova.

cmdB.detail: Show or hide the conversations sidebar.

cmdComma.detail: Quick access to your preferences and account settings.

cmdSlash.detail: Navigate to the full shortcuts documentation page.

gH.detail: Press G then H to navigate to the landing page.

gC.detail: Press G then C to navigate to the chat.

gS.detail: Press G then S to navigate to settings.

gP.detail: Press G then P to view pricing plans.

arrowUp.detail: Move selection up in the command palette.

arrowDown.detail: Move selection down in the command palette.

enter.detail: Execute the selected command or navigate to the selected item.

download.title: Get Nova on every device
download.subtitle: Download the desktop app for macOS or Windows, or install on your phone as an app â€” no app store required.

macos.title: macOS
macos.step1Desc: Click the button below to download the latest installer.
macos.step2Desc: Open the downloaded file and drag Nova to your Applications folder.
macos.step3Desc: Open Nova from Applications or Spotlight (âŒ˜+Space).

windows.title: Windows
windows.step1Desc: Click the button below to get the .exe installer.
windows.step2Desc: Double-click the downloaded file and follow the setup wizard.
windows.step3Desc: Find Nova in your Start menu or desktop shortcut.

mobile.title: Mobile (PWA)
mobile.iosStep1Desc: At the bottom of Safari, tap the share icon.
mobile.iosStep2Desc: Scroll down and tap the option with the + icon.
mobile.iosStep3Desc: Nova will appear on your home screen like a native app.
mobile.androidStep1Desc: In Chrome, tap the three-dot menu at the top right.
mobile.androidStep2Desc: Nova will install and appear on your home screen.

web.title: Prefer the browser?
web.desc: Nova works great in any modern browser. No download needed.
